emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait, left to right: Otto Wendel, adviser; Albert Hamel, John Krug, Kay Crawford, Ruth Arnold, and Virginia Butler, operating machinery in Junior Achievement shop
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 8, 1951, pg. 25 reads: "Learning By Doing-High school students lean [sic] modern business methods through extra-curricular activities of Junior Achievement, Inc... Top right: Clearview Plastics makes perpetual calendars. Left to right: Otto Wendel, adviser; Albert Hamel, John Krug, Kay Crawford, Ruth Arnold and Virginia Butler...Harris Photo."
